snippet.title: Into A Dream - Trailer
snippet.description:
Here it is, the first actual trailer for Into A Dream, an emotional story-driven indie game! :)
You can wishlist the game on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1238360/Into_A_Dream/

I hope you enjoy it, and leave a like and a comment below! 
You can follow Into A Dream's development in our social media:

FACEBOOK @ https://www.facebook.com/IntoADreamGame/
TWITTER @ https://twitter.com/IntoADreamGame
DISCORD @ https://discord.gg/eUcVpEU
INDIEDB @ https://www.indiedb.com/games/into-a-dream
PATREON @ https://www.patreon.com/filipefthomaz

Have a wonderful week! :)
